amendment.description: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to require the Secretary of Transportation, in the process for prioritizing awarding grants under the Advanced Air Mobility Infrastructure Pilot Program established and described in P.L 119-328, also prioritize eligible entities that collaborate with the DOD or National Guard.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Secretary of Transportation, in the process for prioritizing awarding grants under the Advanced Air Mobility Infrastructure Pilot Program to also prioritize eligible entities that collaborate with the Department of Defense or National Guard.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 215 (Roll no. 347).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Huizenga.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 215 (Roll no. 347).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
